Directions: In a large bowl, combine the first four ingredients. Crumble beef over mixture and mix well. Shape into a loaf in a greased roasting pan. Arrange potatoes and green beans around loaf. Pour tomatoes over all. Cover and bake at 350&deg: for 2 hours or until the meat is no longer pink and a meat thermometer reads 160 degrees F.
Ingredients: 1/2 pound fresh or frozen cut green beans
